Flight will take place on October 3, 2010. Time is very short so we will be focusing on getting the Gumstix Overo Fire up and running, and have it record video during the flight.
textAfterTable: For flight Task Status Console image Standard Gumstix console image Minimal quick-booting image[5] Software to capture and save video from camera during flight Software working on desktop computers, see Gstreamer cheat sheet Use Gstreamer to capture raw frames (too much data) Use guvcview to capture MJPG stream (see log entry) Use custom uvccapture to capture individual JPG frames (not fast enough, see log entry) → TBD selected 10% Pinto-TH breakout board Canceled Using Summit due to need for TTY Disable WiFi and BT Overo Air bluetooth and wifi power Simply write 0 to the reset signals[4](TBC) TBC Batteries Mounting hardware Power budget To be written We have about 7 watts at our disposal.
